sentences.en: All cryogenic liquids produce large volumes of gas when they vaporize.
sentences.cn: 所有低温液体在蒸发时都会产生大量的气体.

sentences.en: Chemicals in showering water vaporize at a much faster rate than the actual water.
sentences.cn: 淋浴水中的化学物质比实际的水蒸发速度要快.

sentences.en: How does a laser beam vaporize steel?
sentences.cn: 激光束是怎样使钢气化的?

sentences.en: Some liquid will vaporize to fill the additional space.
sentences.cn: 一些液体会蒸发,以填充额外的空间.

sentences.en: That is why heat can melt ice, vaporize water and cause bodies to expand.
sentences.cn: 这就是热能使冰融化, 使水蒸发,使物体膨胀的原因.

sentences.en: The benzene vaporized and formed a huge cloud of gas.
sentences.cn: 苯蒸发形成了一大团气体。

sentences.en: The earth will in time vaporize with its material and disperse.
sentences.cn: 到那时,地球将与它上面的物体一起汽化而弥散.

sentences.en: The heat from the water is used to vaporize a low - boiling liquid.
sentences.cn: 从水中得到的热用来使一种 低沸点 的液体蒸发.

sentences.en: The meteors are debris from this comet that enter Earth's atmosphere and vaporize as they fall.
sentences.cn: 流星雨是哈雷彗星在穿越地球大气层时掉落的碎片在汽化而成的.

sentences.en: The steam produced in vaporize pan reached the condense pipe through guide plate.
sentences.cn: 在蒸发锅中发生的蒸汽经过导流板装置到达冷凝管.

sentences.en: The vaporize, condense, overflow and guide plate inner are made in stainless steel.
sentences.cn: 蒸发锅 、 冷凝管 、 溢流坝和内部导流板都用不锈钢制成.

sentences.en: VAPORIZE sets free a body fat reducing phenomenon so extraordinary it defies description!
sentences.cn: VAPORIZE另身体发生难以置信的减脂现象!

sentences.en: You can vaporize it and then condense it back again.
sentences.cn: 你可以把它汽化然后再凝结成液体.

words.tran_cn: 似蒸气的；模糊的；忧郁病的
空想的；多蒸气的；雾状的

trans.tran_en: to change into a vapour, or to make something, especially a liquid, do this
